summary: A simple addon for Live Another Start mod by Arthmoor
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/t94iid68u93u5py/manny.png?dl=1&token_hash=AAEIEPhxKj2lO3-1wXsAl9Vypgf6k4TsVc3sxuYWQTLS1Q[/img]

[center][size=10]SALMON SHACK - LAL Version[/size][/center]

[img]http://s22.postimg.org/lg6dn3hht/titolo.jpg[/img]

* THIS MOD IS STANDALONE *
This mod is the LAL (Live another Live) version and it requires the Arthmoor's mod only.
You have to uninstall the non-LAL version first and then install this one.

* DESCRIPTION *
No tons of mannequins,
no tons of mounting weapon plaques,
no rack weapons...

This is just a shack, the Salmon Shack! It's located near the Solitude Sawmill, in the tiny island.
It's a perfect hut for who play Skyrim in inmmersion mode and for who like to be an adventurer. It's near the cart of Solitude,
so no matter for who don't use fast travel, and of course is near Solitude to buy foods and other things.
Since there are some NPCs near the shack, the foods inside it will respawns as usual in exterior places (call this as "lore").
However there is a safe chest (the only one!)

* HOW TO SELECT THIS ADDON FROM DIALOGUE LIST *
When you start a new game with LAL, after character creation, activate the statue of Mara and choos "I've a shack near Solitude"

* LOADING ORDER *
First LAL, then this mod.

* INSTALLATION *
Just unpack the rar and put the ESP into data folder. Enable in your Skyrim launcher and enjoy.

* UNINSTALLATION *
First off, take back all your things from the safe chest (if you did it).
Then simply remove the ESP file.

* COMPATIBILITY *
This mod is your friend, the scripts are only related to Arthmoor's mod and there are no mods conflicts.
Works fine together my Lanterns of Skyrim mod.

* REQUIREMENT (and CREDITS) *
Alternate Start - Live another Live by Arthmoor: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557

* FACEBOOK *
I'm on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods
author: MannyGT
